contest-event.event-date:
June 10, 1961 D Falkirk Ice Rink Contest
Falkirk Ice Rink Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
falkirk-ice-rink-contest
None
Ice Rink, Falkirk, Scotland March contest - 1st Kinneil, 2nd Bo'ness and Carriden, 3rd City of Edinburgh, 4th Alloa. Best section 2 - Alloa. Best section 3 - Gartsherrie. Best section 4 - Cowdenbeath. Deportment - 1st Argyll and Sutherland Highlanders, 2nd Wellesley Colliery. 14 bands competed.
March 1, 2016, 10:32 a.m. March 1, 2016, 10:44 a.m.
1 City of Edinburgh Band John Hoggans
2 Tullis Russell Mills Drake Rimmer
3 Bo'ness and Carriden Band Hugh Forbes
